dmca.title: Landmark Internet protests that mobile phone info is too mobile
dmca.body:
landmark internet
web design : internet marketing : search engine promotion
[private]
Windsor
Berkshire
SL4 3DT

Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
Email: [private]@landmarkinternet.com 
www.landmarkinternet.com

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA

Dear Sir,

I am writing to notify you of a copyright infringement, and request that you remove the offending material under the terms of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
1. The copyright work at issue is the editorial review that appears at http://www.mobile-phones-uk.org.uk/motorola-v3.htm.
2. The material that is infringing the copyright is at
http://www.usernomics.com/news/2005/02/motorola-v3-reviews-by-consumers.html
The Google search query that links to this page is "The Motorola RAZR V3 is one of the most talked-about phones of 2004".
3.	Our contact details are as follows: [private], Windsor, Berkshire, SL4 3DT, United Kingdom; Telephone +44[private]; Email [private]@landmarkinternetcom
4.	We believe that the contact email address of the infringing website is [private]@usernomics.com.
5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly
infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am
the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours faithfully,
 
[private]
Managing Director 
Landmark Internet Ltd
 
<hr>
I am writing to notify you of a copyright infringement, and request that you remove the offending material
under the terms of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
1. The copyright work at issue is the editorial reviews that appear at http://www.mobile-phones-uk.org.uk/nokia-8800.htm http://www.mobile-phones-uk.org.uk/samsung-d500.htm http://www.mobile-phones-uk.org.uk/samsung-e530.htm http://www.mobile-phones-uk.org.uk/sony-ericsson-k750i.htm

2. The material that is infringing the copyright is at: 
http://www.linktrader.co.uk/showitem5809184110
http://www.linktrader.co.uk/showitem6433927450
http://www.linktrader.co.uk/showitem6436635747
http://www.linktrader.co.uk/showitem6404527898
http://www.linktrader.co.uk/showitem6435144974
The Google search queries that link to these pages are: 'The new Sony Ericsson K750i is the latest"
"Announced by Samsung in October 2004, and now available in the UK, the D500"
"Looking at the petite size and lavender pink colour scheme of the Samsung E530"

3. Our contact details are as follows: [private], Windsor, Berkshire, SL4 3DT, United Kingdom; Telephone +44 1753 866060; Email [private]@landmarkinternet.com
4.	We believe that the contact email address of the infringing website is [private]@usernomics.com.
5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that 1 am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
